scripts.remote-stop-and-remove-container: dotenv -- cross-var docker stop %DOCKER_CONTAINER_NAME% || true && dotenv -- cross-var docker rm %DOCKER_CONTAINER_NAME% || true
scripts.remote-run-container: dotenv -- cross-var docker run --restart=always -d --name %DOCKER_CONTAINER_NAME% -e project_id=%project_id% -e client_email=%client_email% -e private_key=%private_key% -e BOT_TOKEN=%BOT_TOKEN% %DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME%
scripts.deploy: cross-var echo Deploying to:$DOCKER_HOST && npm run remote-create-image
scripts.deploy_backup: dotenv cross-var echo Deploying to:%DOCKER_HOST% && npm run prune && npm run compress-output && npm run remote-create-image && npm run remote-stop-and-remove-container && npm run remote-run-container
